name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Asparagus and Carrots
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on asparagus and carrots. —Ed Levine...
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound asparagus, tough ends snapped off
Vinaigrette (mix together oil, vinegar, mustard, garlic, salt, pepper)

recipeInstructions.text: Steam carrot and asparagus together side by side until asparagus is tender.
Arrange asparagus on a platter with carrots on top of asparagus. Let cool. Pour vinaigrette over.
